name: Sipag CMS
body:
### What is Sipag CMS?
Sipag CMS is single page application to create single page website. Build with Codeigniter and Bootstrap. Simple and rich feature, Sipag allow you to create single page website instantly with standard Bootstrap theme, so you still can easily make your own style.

### Features
* Bootstrap theme
* Animation support
* Scrolling navigation
* Ajax configuration
* Mailbox

### Installation
* Download and unzip package then extract to your localhost
* Open you browser, call http://localhost/your-folder-name/install and follow instruction.
More information [click here](https://github.com/fandii/sipag)

### Free to use
Sipag CMS is free and open source under the [MIT Software License](http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php). This license simply protects my liability and lets you do ANYTHING you want. 

### Support 
If you find that Sipag CMS is useful and want to make contribute, feel free to create Pull Request on Sipag CMS github repository. If you some find BUG or something wrong with Sipag CMS, feel free to open new issue. I'm not native english language, so if you find something weird with these words, just tell me, or help me create documentation which still on progress. Also I'm a freelance web developer, hire me by contact below.

### Contact
fandiahm.me[at]gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
